file_content.text: Leave me.
You there! Hold a moment.
My servant offers only platitudes about our Empire's progress here on Voss. I want the truth of things.
Tell me the real state of our efforts here. Do you believe these Voss will submit themselves to us soon?
The Voss will be under our control very soon now.
Our plans go well.
The secret techniques and knowledge of the Voss will soon be ours.
We'll have everything we want.
Politics isn't part of my job.
How should I know?
The locals will submit to Imperial authority--it's only a matter of time.
We will succeed here.
Then this dithering fool isn't misleading me--interesting. Perhaps I will commit some of my own forces to our work here after all.
But then... you may only be saying what I want to hear--or what someone else wants me to hear.
These backward fools will never give us anything of value.
We'll get nothing here.
The Voss guard their secrets closely, and avoid all commitments.
We're getting nowhere.
I don't see why anyone would want a piece of these crazies in the first place.
The Voss seem useless to me.
The locals are evasive and noncommittal, my lord. Not worth our time.
Our resources are wasted here.
Then it is as I suspected. Committing any of my own forces here would be pointless and wasteful.
But then... perhaps you are only trying to guide me away from a profitable endeavor.
How can I trust anything you say? You could be an agent of one of my rivals, hoping to mislead me to my ruin.
Bother someone else.
You refuse to answer me? Are you really so callous with your own life?
Perhaps you feel confident because you serve my rivals and think they can protect you. Is that the way of it?
Do you flee from my questions to keep me from reaching the truth? To lead me into a dangerous miscalculation?
I carry out the Emperor's will alone.
Don't question me.
Bold words. But I sense truth in them.
You believe I have a fiendish plot to walk the streets and mislead any Sith I come across?
Does that seem likely to you?
There's not much money in wandering the streets and lying to Sith Lords.
I only do what I'm paid to.
I am an officer of Imperial Intelligence, not some implement for Sith rivalries.
I serve the Empire.
Hmm... perhaps not.
Think whatever you wish.
Hmm. Such open defiance, in so public a place.
Leave me. I must consider my strategies further, and your presence is only a distraction.
You are a paranoid idiot.
You're crazy, huh?
Only a fool toys with death.
Leave me, and feel fortunate that I am in no mood to risk the Empire's work by destroying you in the streets of Voss-Ka.
Stand aside.
